SEARCH
Package org.apache.turbine.services.servlet

Klasse TurbineServletService

java.lang.Object
org.apache.turbine.services.BaseInitable
org.apache.turbine.services.BaseService
org.apache.turbine.services.TurbineBaseService
org.apache.turbine.services.servlet.TurbineServletService
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Initable, Service, ServletService
public class TurbineServletService extends TurbineBaseService implements ServletService

This class provides a context service when the application is run in a ServletContainer. It is mainly a wrapper around the ServletContext API.

This class requires Servlet API 2.1 or better.

Version:
$Id$
Autor:
Kevin A. Burton, Raphaël Luta, Jeff Brekke, Santiago Gala, Jason van Zyl, Jon S. Stevens

  • Methodendetails

    • init

      public void init()
      Load all configured components and initialize them. This is a zero parameter variant which queries the Turbine Servlet for its config.
      Angegeben von:
      init in Schnittstelle Initable
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      init in Klasse TurbineBaseService

    • getResource

      public URL getResource(String uri)
      Returns an URL object for a given URI string. This URI is considered relative to the context.
      Angegeben von:
      getResource in Schnittstelle ServletService
      Parameter:
      uri - the URI to resolve as an URL
      Gibt zurück:
      an URL object or null is the uri is malformed or can't be resolved
      Siehe auch:
      • ServletContext.getResource(java.lang.String)

    • getResourceAsStream

      public InputStream getResourceAsStream(String uri)

      Angegeben von:
      getResourceAsStream in Schnittstelle ServletService
      Parameter:

      Gibt zurück:

    • expandRelative

      public String expandRelative(String path)
      Expands a string that points to a relative path or path list, leaving it as an absolute path based on the servlet context. It will return null if the text is empty or the config object is null.
      Parameter:
      path - The String containing a path or path list.
      Gibt zurück:
      A String with the expanded path or path list.
